lead_paragraph: After injuries, first baseman Greg Bird and pitcher James Kaprielian are using the Arizona Fall League to salvage a mostly lost year and prepare for 2017.

headline.print_headline: Two Would-Be Yankees, Set Back a Season, Get Reacquainted With the Game
headline.main: Two Would-Be Yankees Reacquaint Themselves With Baseball

snippet: After injuries, first baseman Greg Bird and pitcher James Kaprielian are using the Arizona Fall League to salvage a mostly lost year and prepare for 2017....
abstract: Both first baseman Greg Bird and pitcher James Kaprielian are part of larger than normal contingent of New York Yankees playing for Scottsdale Scorpions in Arizona Fall League; league will give Bird and Kaprielian opportunity to get back into groove of professional baseball after year spent recovering from injuries.
